subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After a surprising run in last year’s N.C.A.A. tournament, Butler’s players and their reputation have taken some lumps, and now the team is starting to finally look like itself.
snippet: After a surprising run in last year’s N.C.A.A. tournament, Butler’s players and their reputation have taken some lumps, and now the team is starting to finally look like itself.
